ModulePrefs.title: pipewee02v1
ModulePrefs.author: Juan M. Aguirregabiria (http://tp.lc.ehu.es/jma.html); lookang; tina
ModulePrefs.description: The first few modes in a pipe are displayed. Each end may be open or closed. One can see the instantaneous displacement and pressure values as a function of position. It is also possible to display the lines of nodes. http://weelookang.blogspot.sg/2015/08/ejss-standing-wave-in-pipe-model.html
